segments.text: I notice the details in this indoor kitchen drawing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman faces the sink, polishing a plate with a towel.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet runs steadily, but the basin is full and spilling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water flows down the cabinet fronts to the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She stands with one foot in the accumulating water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, open cabinets reveal a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A boy climbs a two-step stool, reaching inside the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool tilts backward slightly, looking unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He holds a plate in his other hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Nearby, a girl stands with her arm raised toward him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She seems to be waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window above the sink shows a tidy garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Curtains are tied back, letting in daylight.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stack on the counter, waiting to be put away.
segments.speaker: PAR
